name: CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.Functor.obj_d_f
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
Œπ : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
P : CategoryTheory.Idempotents.Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c)
i j : Œπ
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.Functor.obj P).d i j).f (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (P.p.f i) (P.X.d i j))
decl:
/-- The functor `Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c) ‚•§ HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c`,
on objects. -/
@[simps]
def obj (P : Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c)) : HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c where
  X n :=
    ‚ü®P.X.X n, P.p.f n, by
      simpa only [HomologicalComplex.comp_f] using HomologicalComplex.congr_hom P.idem n‚ü©
  d i j := { f := P.p.f i ‚â´ P.X.d i j }
  shape i j hij := by simp only [hom_eq_zero_iff, P.X.shape i j hij, Limits.comp_zero]; aesop_cat

name: CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.Inverse.obj_p_f
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
Œπ : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
K : HomologicalComplex (CategoryTheory.Idempotents.Karoubi C) c
n : Œπ
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.Inverse.obj K).p.f n) (K.X n).p
decl:
/-- The functor `HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c ‚•§ Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c)`,
on objects -/
@[simps]
def obj (K : HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c) : Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c) where
  X :=
    { X := fun n => (K.X n).X
      d := fun i j => (K.d i j).f
      shape := fun i j hij => hom_eq_zero_iff.mp (K.shape i j hij)
      d_comp_d' := fun i j k _ _ => by
        simpa only [comp_f] using hom_eq_zero_iff.mp (K.d_comp_d i j k) }
  p := { f := fun n => (K.X n).p }

decl:

‚ä¢ Eq CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.counitIso.inv (CategoryTheory.eqToHom ‚ãØ)
decl:
/-- The counit isomorphism of the equivalence
`Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c) ‚âå HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c`. -/
@[simps!]
def counitIso : inverse ‚ãô functor ‚âÖ ùü≠ (HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c) :=
  eqToIso (Functor.ext (fun P => HomologicalComplex.ext (by aesop_cat) (by simp))
    (by aesop_cat))

name: CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.unitIso_hom_app_f_f
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
Œπ : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
P : CategoryTheory.Idempotents.Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c)
n : Œπ
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Idempotents.KaroubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence.unitIso.hom.app P).f.f n) (P.p.f n)
decl:
/-- The unit isomorphism of the equivalence
`Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c) ‚âå HomologicalComplex (Karoubi C) c`. -/
@[simps]
def unitIso : ùü≠ (Karoubi (HomologicalComplex C c)) ‚âÖ functor ‚ãô inverse where
  hom :=
    { app := fun P =>
        { f :=
            { f := fun n => P.p.f n
              comm' := fun i j _ => by
                dsimp
                simp only [HomologicalComplex.Hom.comm, HomologicalComplex.Hom.comm_assoc,
                  HomologicalComplex.p_idem] }
          comm := by
            ext n
            dsimp
            simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem] }
      naturality := fun P Q œÜ => by
        ext
        dsimp
        simp only [comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_p_d, Inverse.map_f_f,
          Functor.map_f_f, HomologicalComplex.p_comp_d] }
  inv :=
    { app := fun P =>
        { f :=
            { f := fun n => P.p.f n
              comm' := fun i j _ => by
                dsimp
                simp only [HomologicalComplex.Hom.comm, assoc, HomologicalComplex.p_idem] }
          comm := by
            ext n
            dsimp
            simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem] }
      naturality := fun P Q œÜ => by
        ext
        dsimp
        simp only [comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, Inverse.map_f_f, Functor.map_f_f,
          HomologicalComplex.comp_p_d, HomologicalComplex.p_comp_d] }
  hom_inv_id := by
    ext
    dsimp
    simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem, comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, _root_.id_eq]
  inv_hom_id := by
    ext
    dsimp
    simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem, comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, _root_.id_eq,
      Inverse.obj_p_f, Functor.obj_X_p]

        ext
        dsimp
        simp only [comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_p_d, Inverse.map_f_f,
          Functor.map_f_f, HomologicalComplex.p_comp_d] }
  inv :=
    { app := fun P =>
        { f :=
            { f := fun n => P.p.f n
              comm' := fun i j _ => by
                dsimp
                simp only [HomologicalComplex.Hom.comm, assoc, HomologicalComplex.p_idem] }
          comm := by
            ext n
            dsimp
            simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem] }
      naturality := fun P Q œÜ => by
        ext
        dsimp
        simp only [comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, Inverse.map_f_f, Functor.map_f_f,
          HomologicalComplex.comp_p_d, HomologicalComplex.p_comp_d] }
  hom_inv_id := by
    ext
    dsimp
    simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem, comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, _root_.id_eq]
  inv_hom_id := by
    ext
    dsimp
    simp only [HomologicalComplex.p_idem, comp_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, _root_.id_eq,
      Inverse.obj_p_f, Functor.obj_X_p]

name: CategoryTheory.Idempotents.instIsIdempotentCompleteHomologicalComplex
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_1} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
Œπ : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape Œπ
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIdempotentComplete C
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.IsIdempotentComplete (HomologicalComplex C c)
decl:
instance [IsIdempotentComplete C] : IsIdempotentComplete (HomologicalComplex C c) := by
  rw [isIdempotentComplete_iff_of_equivalence
      ((toKaroubiEquivalence C).mapHomologicalComplex c),
    ‚Üê isIdempotentComplete_iff_of_equivalence (karoubiHomologicalComplexEquivalence C c)]
  infer_instance
